languages.text: "Лорд-капитан... что вы наделали? Я же просила вас... Я чувствую себя как-то странно. Я наконец-то... могу заткнуть голоса. Могу услышать себя. И... не могу избавиться от чувства невосполнимой утраты. Вроде бы я все еще я, но чего-то не хватает. Чего-то важного".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан... что вы наделали? Я же просила вас... Я чувствую себя как-то странно. Я наконец-то в контроле — я могу заткнуть голоса в любой момент и услышать себя. Но... Я также не могу избавиться от чувства невосполнимой утраты. Вроде бы я все еще я, но чего-то не хватает. Чего-то важного".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан... что вы наделали? Я же просила вас... Я чувствую себя как-то странно. Я наконец-то... могу заткнуть голоса. Могу услышать себя. И... не могу избавиться от чувства невосполнимой утраты. Вроде бы я все еще я, но чего-то не хватает. Чего-то важного".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人……你做了什么事情？我明明告诉你……但不知为什么，我感觉很古怪。我可以……让那些声音停下来了，我可以听到我自己思考的声音。但是……我感觉有什么东西彻底消失了。我觉得我还是以前的我，但却少了什么东西，少了某些重要的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……你做了什么事情？我明明告诉你……但不知为什么，我感觉很古怪。我可以……让那些声音停下来了，我可以听到我自己思考的声音。但是……我感觉有什么东西彻底消失了。我觉得我还是以前的我，但却少了什么东西，少了某些重要的东西。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán... ¿qué ha hecho? Le pedí... Me siento extraña. Puedo... hacer que callen las voces. Puedo oírme pensar. Y... no puedo quitarme la sensación de haber perdido algo irreemplazable. Creo que sigo siendo yo, pero me falta algo. Algo importante».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán... ¿qué ha hecho? Le pedí... Me siento extraña. Puedo... hacer que callen las voces. Puedo oírme pensar. Y... no puedo quitarme la sensación de haber perdido algo irreemplazable. Creo que sigo siendo yo, pero me falta algo. Algo importante».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain ... was habt Ihr getan? Ich habe Euch gefragt ... Ich fühle mich irgendwie merkwürdig. Ich kann ... die Stimmen schweigen lassen. Ich kann mich selbst denken hören. Und ... ich kann das Gefühl eines unersetzlichen Verlusts nicht abschütteln. Ich glaube, ich bin noch immer ich selbst, aber irgendetwas fehlt. Etwas Wichtiges."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ... was habt Ihr getan? Ich habe Euch gefragt ... Ich fühle mich irgendwie merkwürdig. Ich kann ... die Stimmen schweigen lassen. Ich kann mich selbst denken hören. Und ... ich kann das Gefühl eines unersetzlichen Verlusts nicht abschütteln. Ich glaube, ich bin noch immer ich selbst, aber irgendetwas fehlt. Etwas Wichtiges."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…何をしたの？ねえ答えて…なんだか変な気分なの。あの声を…止められるの。考え事もできる。でも…かけがえのないものを失った感覚が拭い切れない。自分を保ててるとは思うけど、何かが欠けてる。何か大切なものが」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…何をしたの？ねえ答えて…なんだか変な気分なの。あの声を…止められるの。考え事もできる。でも…かけがえのないものを失った感覚が拭い切れない。自分を保ててるとは思うけど、何かが欠けてる。何か大切なものが」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Qu'avez-vous fait ? Je vous ai demandé... Je me sens bizarre. Je peux... faire taire les voix. Je m'entends penser. Et pourtant... j'ai toujours l'impression d'avoir connu une perte irremplaçable. Je crois que je suis toujours moi-même, mais il me manque quelque chose. Quelque chose d'important. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Qu'avez-vous fait ? Je vous ai demandé... Je me sens bizarre. Je peux... faire taire les voix. Je m'entends penser. Et pourtant... j'ai toujours l'impression d'avoir connu une perte irremplaçable. Je crois que je suis toujours moi-même, mais il me manque quelque chose. Quelque chose d'important. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan... Ne yaptın? Sana sormuştum... Çok tuhaf hissediyorum. Sesleri susturabiliyorum. Kendi düşüncelerimi duyabiliyorum. Fakat yerini dolduramadığım bir kayıp hissi var. Sanırım hâlâ kendimim ama bir şey eksik. Önemli bir şey."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... what have you done? I asked you... I feel strange somehow. I can... make the voices stop. I can hear myself think. And... I can't shake the feeling of some irreplaceable loss. I think I'm still me, but something is missing. Something important."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan... Ne yaptın? Sana sormuştum... Çok tuhaf hissediyorum. Sesleri susturabiliyorum. Kendi düşüncelerimi duyabiliyorum. Fakat yerini dolduramadığım bir kayıp hissi var. Sanırım hâlâ kendimim ama bir şey eksik. Önemli bir şey."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
